title: Regression in the Debug formatter

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
The `Debug` formatter output was recently changed in #30967 to always include a decimal point, and apparently some crates' test suites depends on the exact output of the formatter. I don't know if it's worth to revert the change, but I reported it just in case.

* [caldyn](https://crates.io/crates/caldyn) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/caldyn-0.4.1/log.txt))
* [earlgrey](https://crates.io/crates/earlgrey) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log 1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/earlgrey-0.0.7/log.txt) and [crater log 2](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/earlgrey-0.1.0/log.txt))
* [euclid](https://crates.io/crates/euclid) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log 1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/euclid-0.15.6/log.txt) and [crater log 2](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/euclid-0.16.1/log.txt)), but it's fixed on master
* [expecttest](https://crates.io/crates/expectest) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/expectest-0.9.1/log.txt)), but it's fixed on master
* [mkv](https://crates.io/crates/mkv) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/mkv-0.0.7/log.txt))
* [postgis](https://crates.io/crates/postgis) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/postgis-0.4.0/log.txt))
* [pretty_assertions](https://crates.io/crates/pretty_assertions) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/pretty_assertions-0.4.1/log.txt)), but it's fixed on master
* [scanlex](https://crates.io/crates/scanlex) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/scanlex-0.1.0/log.txt))
* [spectral](https://crates.io/crates/spectral) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/spectral-0.6.0/log.txt))
* [vectors](https://crates.io/crates/vectors) regressed from stable to beta ([crater log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/1.23.0-1.24.0-beta.3/beta-2018-01-13/reg/vectors-0.1.0/log.txt))

 cc @dtolnay @luthaf @rodolf0
